title: Now That Aatrox's Revive is Being Removed
body:
And he's being worked on again for yet another patch, it's time again to ask if Riot can finally fix the walk animation on his base skins.

The fixed it for Bloodmoom but the animation loop on every other skin jerks back to its original position without a smooth loop.

It feels real bad to play a champ and have him look like he's incomplete.

Whatever, base skin looks disgusting anyways, pre rework looked so much better and sounded better it's hilarious.
If we ignore skins aatrox is probably the worst rework ever in term of visuals (but thank god the skins exist).
